title: vArAdu vArumayyA
sahitya:
vArAdu vArumayyA oaghaip-puyalgaL


anupallavi

  vErODenaik-keDukkap-pOrADu mAyangaL vITTaik-koLLaiyaDikkum kATTut-tiruDargaL


caraNam    kAriyattirkkenru kAlaip-piDittu munnE kAriyam Anadum kai viTTigazhndu pinnE
hInamillAda naya vanjar iraiva ninnai illai enbAr mINDum ennait-tollai sheyya
